title: Changelog
description: We really need to start with the 1.7 changelog, since Greg's nearly at Gregtech 5.01 and we've only got the generic changes

replies.body: You really intend to make a list of all the changes in the versions of GT 5.00 from a to y?
Majority of them are small. If someone can work out where they start (AKA what a's changelog was) I'd do the rest.

Firstly, we need to find out if greg'll release a full changelog at some time in the future (which I doubt) then we start collecting changelogs from the forum if this is not the case. We could also pretend that GT 5.00 starts from scratch, and say something like:

GT 5.00 ALPHA
Added X
Added Y
Added Z

Just listing everything that exists currently (this would be a worst case thing).
Well, I started looking for where Greg could have possibly started posting what added, but the fact is that he doesen't say which version is which...
New plan, I'll work backwards from the 5.0y update post

It's done. It only took an hour, and the changelogs from 5.00e are patchy and probably partly wrong, but it is done.
Gregtech leaves alpha texture update (5.01a)
